title: Belinda (A)
creator_credit: Trojan Films, Save the Children Fund, Jack Lee and Peter Thompson
brief_description: Chronicles the first few days of a three year old Aboriginal girl at a preschool kindergarten in Walgett, N.S.W. Shows the growth in trust between teacher and child until the girl and her mother disappear on walkabout.
creator_credit_for_label: Trojan Films, Save the Children Fund, Jack Lee and Peter Thompson
